citations.narrative:
The facility failed to conduct or failed to maintain complete records of water sampling for marine mammal pools at the
minimum frequency required by the Animal Welfare Act (AWA). A review of water quality records show coliform testing
was not conducted during the week of December 1-7, 2024.
Interruptions in water sampling can hinder the facility's ability to ensure the water is not detrimental to the health and well-
being to the animals.
Water samples shall be taken and tested at least weekly for coliform count. Records must be kept documenting the time
when all such samples were taken and the results of the sampling. To be corrected from this day, December 14, 2024,
forward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
Additional Inspectors:
KRISTIN NAPOLI, SUPERVISORY ANIMAL CARE SPECIALIST n

narrative:
3.106(b)(3) 
   
Water quality. 
The facility failed to conduct or failed to maintain complete records of water sampling for marine mammal pools at the 
minimum frequency required by the Animal Welfare Act (AWA). A review of water quality records show coliform testing 
was not conducted during the week of December 1-7, 2024. 
 
Interruptions in water sampling can hinder the facility's ability to ensure the water is not detrimental to the health and well-
being to the animals. 
 
Water samples shall be taken and tested at least weekly for coliform count. Records must be kept documenting the time 
when all such samples were taken and the results of the sampling. To be corrected from this day, December 14, 2024, 
forward. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
KRISTIN NAPOLI, SUPERVISORY ANIMAL CARE SPECIALIST n

species.scientific: Ara, Anodorhynchus, Primolius, Diopsittaca spp hybrid
